input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs - Beef Flavor

Item keywords:
Formulated specifically for dogs
Does not foam
Controls plaque
Fights bad breath
Beef and poultry flavors
input_text.Response A: Attention dog owners! Are you tired of your dog's bad breath and plaque-covered teeth? Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is the solution you've been searching for. This toothpaste is specifically formulated for dogs and contains beef and poultry flavors that they'll love. It controls plaque and fights bad breath, all without foaming. Give your dog the gift of healthy teeth and gums with Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs. Order now and see the difference it can make!
input_text.Response B: Petrodex Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is a veterinarian-recommended, enzymatic toothpaste that is specially formulated for dogs. It does not foam, and contains enzymes that control plaque and fight bad breath. Available in beef and poultry flavors, your dog will love the taste! This product is made in the USA.

label_annotations.feedback: Reponse B was slightly better as it got all the details in in a concise way
